item.mana-and-artifice.cantrip_book.conf: You scan across the pages of the book but can't make sense of the contents.  You will need to learn more before you can use it.
I'll need to gather up the following reagents for the Ritual of Arcana:
item.mana-and-artifice.entrapment_crysta: The entity this crystal held can't be resolved
item.mana-and-artifice.guide_book.magic_: 将这本古籍拿在手上，你感到了由它发出的强烈呼唤。你匆匆浏览了前面的几页，而随着阅读的愈发深入，这些艰深晦涩的知识已然耗费了你数个小时的时间。书上的知识让你豁然开朗，你能察觉到周围的魔法能量像是漩涡一般环绕着你。你已经窥见了奥术这门隐秘知识的一角！
item.mana-and-artifice.book_of_rote.part: %s 还未被熟记，你无法使用本书施放该法术。
item.mana-and-artifice.crystal_of_memori: The crystal is full with %d experience
Returning XP.  Sneak+Right Click to change.
Taking XP.  Sneak+Right Click to change.
item.mana-and-artifice.manaweaver_wand.l: 你当前浅陋的学识和技巧不足以让你编织出这一图样。
item.mana-and-artifice.ritual_kit.store_: 无法保存该仪式样式！请确保仪式样式以及试剂全部正确放置。
item.mana-and-artifice.ritual_kit.not_ki: 这一仪式无法被仪式用具袋保存。
item.mana-and-artifice.ritual_kit.not_en: 仪式用具袋没有足够的物品完成仪式。
item.mana-and-artifice.rune_warding.ward: 一股魔法的守护力量阻止了你！
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.shift_promp: 按下 SHIFT 可以查看详细信息
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.alt_prompt: 按下 ALT 可以查看需求试剂
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.tier-fail: 你当前浅陋的学识和经验不足以让你施放这一法术。
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.complexity-: 这一法术的复杂度已经远超出了你的操控能力。
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.faction-fai: 你所在的派系不允许你施放该法术。
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.reagents-mi: 你缺少施放该法术所需要的试剂。
item.mana-and-artifice.spell.no-magic: 你不太确定此时你能用这件物品做些什么。
block.mana-and-artifice.runic_anvil.low_: 你感觉理论上应该能够正常进行，但你目前所拥有的技巧或者学识还不足以支撑你完成这一工作。
block.mana-and-artifice.occulus.confusio: 你凝视着这一漂浮于空中的晶体，倏忽之间，你感到你的意识仿佛被它迅猛地拉扯、吞噬。你连忙闭上了眼睛，并转过身去不再面对它。看来在你能够使用它之前，你还得对它在做一番深入的研究才行。
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.compon: 该构件无法使用引导形状。
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.low_ti: 你的等阶还不足以让你抄写该法术。
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.too_co: 这一法术的复杂度远不是你当前的等阶可以掌握的。
gui.mana-and-artifice.inscription.wrong_: 你的派系不允许你合成该法术。
gui.mana-and-artifice.tier_progress: 完成以下 %2$s 个任务中的 %1$s 个任务即可升入下一等阶:
gui.mana-and-artifice.recipe.wrongfactio: 这一仪式需要你提供一种不同于当前派系的力量。
gui.mana-and-artifice.command.place_bloc: 将方块放置到指定位置
gui.mana-and-artifice.hud_mode.condition: 只会在持有会消耗魔力的物品时才会显示 HUD
gui.mana-and-artifice.codex_mode.esc_out: 按下 ESC 键直接关闭古籍，按下 UI 按钮可返回
gui.mana-and-artifice.codex_mode.esc_ui_: ESC/UI 按钮可返回，目录界面按下 ESC 直接关闭古籍
gui.mana-and-artifice.codex_mode.rmouse_: 右击/UI 按钮可返回，按下 ESC 键直接关闭古籍
右击/UI/ESC 可返回，目录界面按下 ESC 直接关闭古籍
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ritual_f: 这个实体没有任何回应...也许是因为你已经向别人献上了你的忠诚？
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ally_dem: 来自地狱的烈焰环绕着我，但它已无法灼烧我的一分一毫。你已与来自下界的恶魔建立了同盟关系！
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ally_fey: 你的一半脸庞感受到了来自盛夏的温热，另一半则感受到了来自寒冬的冰冷。你已与仙女之庭建立了同盟关系！
event.mana-and-artifice.faction_ally_anc: 你感受到了今世与过去的众多巫师的存在，他们将他们渊博的学识与浩瀚的力量分享与你，你已与远古议会建立了同盟关系！
mana-and-artifice:runescribing/runescrib: 符文样式：恒定仪式符文
mana-and-artifice:rituals/return.not_fou: 未找到与此组合相匹配的返回点。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/return.world_n: 未找到与世界符咒调谐的世界。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/summon.wrong_d: %s 超出了你的法术延伸距离。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/summon.not_fou: 未找到指定玩家（玩家有可能不在线，也有可能玩家符咒没有与玩家调谐）。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/visit.wrong_di: %s 超出了你的法术延伸距离。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/visit.not_foun: 未找到指定玩家（玩家有可能不在线，也有可能玩家符咒没有与玩家调谐）。
mana-and-artifice:rituals/flat_lands.too: 仪式与目标地区距离太远，失败了。

ritual.mana-and-artifice.untamed_wind.to: 仪式进行之处过低，再搭高一些！
ritual.mana-and-artifice.ancient_stone.t: 仪式进行之处过高，再挖深一些！

周围的书架数量未达到仪式要求，请查一查古籍。

mana-and-artifice:progresscondition.read: 你已获得了足够的经验来晋升下一等阶！查看神秘核心可以获得进一步的线索。

mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ca: I need to be able to %s in order to help you with this, sorry boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.co: This Lodestar is a lot to handle, I'm getting confused...I'll just start over.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.su: This Lodestar command (index %d) doesn't seem to exist...I think this might be a bug.  I'm skipping it.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.mo: 我找不到前往 %.2f, %.2f, %.2f 的路
我找不到前往 %s 的路
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.te: The block I'm looking for isn't the right type, did it get broken?  I'll skip this.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ac: I would activate the block like you asked, but it either isn't configured or doesn't exist.
我正在激活 %s ，它位于 %d, %d, %d。点击。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: 我没办法在 %s 上放东西...我手里啥东西也没有。我会跳过该步骤。
我把 %s 放进了 %s 里。
我没办法把 %s 放进 %s 里。抱歉老大。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.in: 看起来 %s 没办法持有物品。我会跳过该步骤。希望不会出大乱子。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ta: 我没办法从 %s 中取出东西...我可没有空闲的手来拿东西了。我会跳过该步骤.
我没法从 %s 中取出东西。抱歉老大。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ha: 我找到了一些植物，我会紧盯住它们的！
我在当前区域内没有找到你所指定的植物。抱歉老大。
我也很想遵照指示采摘植物，但我的工作区域要么没被正确配置，要么根本不存在。
我正在指定区域内搜寻你所指示的植物。
我正在收获 %s ，它位于 %d，%d，%d。全部收光！
我认为原先的位置 %d，%d，%d 是有效的，但现在不太行了（因为我看到 %s 在那）。我还是跳过对当前步骤吧。
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: I found some good places with soil, I'll keep an eye on them!
I can't find any soil blocks in the area you specified.  Sorry boss.
I would like to plant these seeds like you asked, but the area either isn't configured or doesn't exist
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.so: I'm looking through the area you set up for soil blocks.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: 我在 %d, %d, %d 那种上了 %s 。小种子，快快长大吧！
现在我可没法种植东西，我手上压根没有种子。抱歉老大。
I thought the block at %d, %d, %d was valid, but it isn't now (I see a %s).  I'll skip it.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.ru: I couldn't figure out the recipe from the paper that's in the table...this might be a bug, but double check it?
I don't have a recipe to scribe, so I'll have to skip this step.
I don't see a slate in the Runescribing Table here, so I'll need to skip this.
I see an item in the Runescribing Table here but it isn't a slate, so I'll need to skip this.
Done scribing!  Some of my best work.
This runeforge isn't set up to make anything right now.  Need two items boss!
This doesn't look like a recipe I can runeforge, boss.  I don't see how these can go together.
I'm not a high enough tier to make this, boss.  I'm sorry.
Done forging the %s.  Very cool, boss!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.re: This was a workbench, but it isn't anymore...I'll just wait here.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.bu: I see a %s that's ready for butchering.
I'd be happy to thin the herd for you boss but I don't have the area set up yet.
I don't see any valid targets to butcher, I'll skip this for now.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pl: I can't place a block if I'm not holding one, boss.
I can't place a block there, boss, the area isn't clear.
I wasn't able to place this block where you asked me to, boss.  Sorry.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.br: I don't have any items to breed right now boss.
I don't see any valid targets to breed right now boss, I'll skip this for now.
I found %d %ss, I'll try to breed them for you boss.
I don't have the right item to breed those, boss.
I can't breed any animals for you right now boss, you haven't configured the area yet.
Got some %ss breeding for you boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.pa: Hostile %s is down boss, going pack to patrol.
I don't have any points to patrol boss, I'm going to skip this.
Done this round of my patrol boss.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.fo: I'll follow and guard you boss!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.at: I see a %s that's a threat!  I'll protect you boss!  En garde, villain!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.le: This %s isn't vanquished yet but you're too far away, boss!  Wait for me!
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.vi: I've slain the vile %s boss.  On my way back to you.
mana-and-artifice.constructs.feedback.de: Bye boss.  I hope I did good.  I love you.
mana-and-artifice:advancements.root.desc: Begin your journey into the arcane arts
mana-and-artifice:advancements.mine_vint: This strange ore pulses with a dim blue light.  I wonder what would happen if I smelted it?
mana-and-artifice:advancements.smelt_vin: The dust left over from that strange ore seems to have minor magnetic properties.  Perhaps I should combine it with iron?
mana-and-artifice:advancements.combine_v: I was right!  The dust clings to the iron!  It seems to fuse into it slightly from the heat of my hand...should I smelt it again?
mana-and-artifice:advancements.re_smelt_: This metal is incredible.  I should make a few more and go see if there are villagers that would be interested int trading it.
mana-and-artifice:advancements.villager_: This book holds so many secrets.  I should read it to continue my journey into the world of the arcane.
